recommendation: I recoomend to only buy the lottery monthly with two tickets. The data below describes the money earned with 2 lottery tickets every month.
The average amount of money is around the 20k. The suggestion I decide allows for some extra money to come into ENS Door while also with work.
It is the best decision because ENS Door is only spending on average $20 for the chance of winning the lottery. It is not too costly but also not too risky.
Average with recommendation: $23169.
Average without lottery: $23145.6

There is not much difference betweent the two so mamizing the money and do monthly of 2 tickets.
